response.overview: Think Thank, the oddball outsider, the rule breaker. The group of kids who can do it all, do things differently and always deliver. Based loosely around the Northwest and in love with Summit at Snoqualmie these guys have been pumping out fan favorites for years, and this might be their finest work yet. With an updated roster, missing some of the old favorites but adding great new talent, Ransack Rebellion delivers on what you’d expect from the Think Thank crew—a unique approach to kicking ass.
response.title: Ransack Rebellion
